title: Hidden Dragon
description: Unison holds many enigmas locked within its ice bound surface, and this Long Day, Erann is about to discover that he holds the key to unraveling these riddles.The time is now.As the long overdue sun rise finally crests the horizon after half a rotation, Sereh, Erann and Greeneyes find themselves rediscovering the lost secrets of their cold and frozen land.(Previously published as Purple).
author: M.J. Porter
